code: private static StepKey readOptionalNextStepKey(StreamInput in) throws IOException {     if (in.readBoolean()) {         return new StepKey(in.readString(), in.readString(), in.readString()).     }     return null. }

@Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     out.writeString(getKey().getPhase()).     out.writeString(getKey().getAction()).     out.writeString(getKey().getName()).     boolean hasNextStep = getNextStepKey() != null.     out.writeBoolean(hasNextStep).     if (hasNextStep) {         out.writeString(getNextStepKey().getPhase()).         out.writeString(getNextStepKey().getAction()).         out.writeString(getNextStepKey().getName()).     } }
